alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:19PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Rosebud County through 500 PM MDT... At 418 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 23 miles east of Melstone, or 30 miles north of Hysham, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail, along with brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Rosebud County, north of highway 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Montana.
